content: This is a **Markdown test example**, demonstrating how to use various Markdown formats in content.

## Supported Markdown Features

We support multiple Markdown formats:

1. **Bold text** - using double asterisks
2. *Italic text* - using single asterisks
3. `Code snippets` - using backticks
4. [Link text](https://example.com) - using brackets and parentheses

### Quote Example

> This is a blockquote example.
> 
> Blockquotes can contain multiple lines.

---

### List Examples

**Unordered list:**

- First item
- Second item
  - Sub-item A
  - Sub-item B
- Third item

**Ordered list:**

1. First...
2. Then...
3. Finally...
This example shows how to mix **bold**, *italic*, and `code` in the same paragraph. You can also add [external links](https://github.com).
This way, you can write rich content in JSON files and see formatted results in the browser!
